projects.name: E-commerce Checkout Redesign
projects.challenge: Client's checkout flow had 62% cart abandonment rate, costing significant revenue
projects.solution: Conducted user research to identify friction points, simplified the flow from 5 steps to 3, added progress indicators, and implemented guest checkout

projects.name: Design System Development
projects.challenge: Three product teams were creating inconsistent UI components, leading to design debt and slow iteration
projects.solution: Created comprehensive design system in Figma with reusable components, documentation, and design tokens

projects.name: Fitness App Development
projects.challenge: Create intuitive fitness tracking experience for mobile-first users
projects.solution: Designed mobile-first wireframes and prototypes focusing on quick data entry and visual progress tracking
results: 60% reduction in user-reported bugs through developer collaboration

current_role.title: UX Designer
key_responsibilities: Lead UX design for e-commerce and SaaS clients
Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with product and engineering teams
major_achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects with measurable impact
Increased team efficiency by 40% through design system
Generated $140K+ quarterly revenue through conversion optimization
